## IAT Data Visualization

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(ggplot2)
  library(dplyr)
  library(ggpubr)
})

load("data.rda")
```

```{r}
plt = ggplot(data = data_normalized, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = condition)) +
  labs(color = "") +
  facet_grid(condition~.) +
  xlab("") +
  ylab("") +
  theme_pubr() +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 10));
plt
```
